title: Apoorva Kundan and Pearl Haaram with Matching Jhumka Set
materials: 22K Gold Plated. High-quality Kundan stones with meticulously placed White CZ stones. Featuring lustrous freshwater pearls
and an emerald drop. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases intricate Kundan work, a hallmark of traditional Indian jewelry. The floral motifs are embellished with dazzling CZ stones. The pendant features a central emerald drop for added opulence. The matching Jhumkas echo the Haaram's design, featuring pearl drops and a ruby accent.
colors: and Green. The combination of gold and pearls is a classic South Indian pairing
while the ruby and emerald add a vibrant touch.
occasions: or any grand celebration. Also suitable for formal events where you want to make a statement.
description: This Haaram set is a masterpiece of traditional craftsmanship combined with modern sensibilities. The Hyderabadi polish ensures longevity, while the Kundan work exudes timeless elegance. It is a heirloom-worthy piece that can be passed down through generations, embodying cultural richness and tradition.
